data.text: “Before the Israeli people became a nation [MET],
But while I continued to call them,
The people of Israel were like a little boy [MET],
It was as though I fastened ropes around them to lead them,
But the people of Israel will become slaves again,
Their enemies will use their swords to attack the cities in Israel
My people are determined to ◄turn away from/abandon► me.
You people of Israel, I certainly do not want to [RHQ] abandon you
You will follow me when I roar like [SIM] a lion;
Some of you will come swiftly from Egypt
Yahweh says, “The people of Israel have ◄surrounded me with lies/constantly told lies to me►.
